com.sawyer.advadapters.widget

Interface PatchedExpandableListAdapter.ChoiceModeListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActionMode.Callback
    Enclosing class:
    PatchedExpandableListAdapter

    public static interface PatchedExpandableListAdapter.ChoiceModeListener
extends ActionMode.Callback
    An interface definition for callbacks that receive events for ChoiceMode modal variants. It acts as the ActionMode.Callback for the selection mode and also receives checked state change events when the user selects and deselects groups or children views.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChildCheckedStateChanged(ActionMode mode, int groupPosition, long groupId, int childPosition, long childId, boolean checked)
      Called when a child item is checked or unchecked during selection mode.
      void onGroupCheckedStateChanged(ActionMode mode, int groupPosition, long groupId, boolean checked)
      Called when a group item is checked or unchecked during selection mode.

      • Methods inherited from interface android.view.ActionMode.Callback

        onActionItemClicked, onCreateActionMode, onDestroyActionMode, onPrepareActionMode

    • Method Detail

      • onChildCheckedStateChanged

        void onChildCheckedStateChanged(ActionMode mode,
                                int groupPosition,
                                long groupId,
                                int childPosition,
                                long childId,
                                boolean checked)
        Called when a child item is checked or unchecked during selection mode.
        Parameters:
        mode - The ActionMode providing the selection mode
        childPosition - Adapter position of the child item that was checked or unchecked
        childId - Adapter ID of the child item that was checked or unchecked
        groupPosition - Adapter position of the group this child belongs to.
        groupId - Adapter ID of the group this child belongs to.
        checked - true if the item is now checked, false if the item is now unchecked.

      • onGroupCheckedStateChanged

        void onGroupCheckedStateChanged(ActionMode mode,
                                int groupPosition,
                                long groupId,
                                boolean checked)
        Called when a group item is checked or unchecked during selection mode. If the group is expanded, then all of it's children will have their checked state changed to match and onChildCheckedStateChanged() will be appropriately invoked for each.
        Parameters:
        mode - The ActionMode providing the selection mode
        groupPosition - Adapter position of the group item that was checked or unchecked
        groupId - Adapter ID of the group item that was checked or unchecked
        checked - true if the item is now checked, false if the item is now unchecked.
